definitions.definition: Any fictional crime-fighting character, often with supernatural powers or equipment, in popular children's and fantasy literature ; a fictional hero who does great things.
A particularly renowned real-world hero , or one who has seemingly impossible abilities.
examples: The power is out but you're watching TV? You must be a superhero .
Thanks for driving out here and towing me out of the ditch. You're a superhero !

main_definition: Any fictional crime-fighting character, often with supernatural powers or equipment, in popular children's and fantasy literature ; a fictional hero who does great things.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A particularly renowned real-world hero , or one who has seemingly impossible abilities.
